events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the product I did not order.
The system detected keywords related to refund and has categorized the issue accordingly for faster handling.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to your case to assist you further with your request.
Hello! I understand you want to request a refund due to receiving the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo of the item, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and clear solution to my refund request.
Your refund has been initiated and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully and were able to return the wrong product without any trouble.
We are closing your support case now as all issues have been resolved. Thank you for contacting us and we hope to serve you better next time.
